original: Lindstedt, August Torvald, läroverksadjunkt, Göteborg, f. 18/10/96 i Aryd, Blek. 1., av folkskollär. A. Lindstedt o. Kristina Vesterberg. G. 21 m. Ester Andersson. Barn: Sven f. 27. — Stud:ex. i Kristianstad 14, fil. kand. i Lund 16, fil. mag. s. å., fil. lic. 21, provår v. Gbgs h. latin 20-21, behörigh. t. lekt:tj. v. folksk:sem. 22. E. o. ämneslär. i Hörby 19-20, extra-lär. v. Malmö gosslärov. 21-23, timlär. v. Malmö ensk. latin- o. reallärov. samma tid, lektor i modersm. o. tyska v. Härnösands folksk:sem. 23, adj. i modersm. o. hist. m. samh :lära v. Vasa h. a. il. i Gbg sed. 30, tillika bibi. där, timlär. v. Gbgs samsk. 31. Tjg. v. Härnösands folksk:s’em. även som bibi. samt som rektor kort. tider. Ordf. i Angermanl. föreläsn :förb. 29-30, sekr. i Gbgs lär:sällsk. 31-32. Stud:-resor t. Danm. o. Tyskl. 21, 22, 23 o. 24. Skr.: ett stort antal upps. o. rec. i facktidskr. o. fackpress. RVO.
translated: Lindstedt, August Torvald, school instructor, Gothenburg, b. 18/10/96 in Aryd, Blekinge, son of the elementary school teacher A. Lindstedt and Kristina Vesterberg. Married on the 21st with Ester Andersson. Children: Sven b. 27. Completed high school in Kristianstad in '14, B.A. in Lund in '16, M.A. in the same year, Ph.D. in '21, probationary year at Gothenburg's higher Latin school '20-'21, qualified for teaching at the elementary school seminary in '22. Acting and subject teacher in Hörby '19-'20, substitute teacher at Malmö boys' school '21-'23, part-time teacher at Malmö private Latin and real school during the same period, lecturer in mother tongue and German at Härnösand's elementary school seminary in '23, instructor in mother tongue and history with social science at Vasa Higher School in Gothenburg since '30, also serves as a librarian there, part-time teacher at Gothenburg's private school '31. Worked at Härnösand's elementary school seminary as a librarian and as a rector for brief periods. Chairman of the Angermanland Lecture Association '29-'30, secretary of Gothenburg's Teachers' Society '31-'32. Study trips to Denmark and Germany in '21, '22, '23, and '24. Have written a large number of essays and reviews in professional journals and trade press. RVO..

structured.name: August Torvald Lindstedt
